item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Most stupid moments thread
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Ruby:

Or everyone could just look at fat cookies epic threads.

Pretty much. We are trying to foster a positive community here, where members can thrive and post without fear. A thread like this would just be a pointless bashing.

Also, just in response to loveandpower talking about Rule 2. We do enforce that rule, daily. Maybe you don’t notice, however. Also you must take into account a moderators discretion, which plays a big role.

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Most stupid moments thread
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Threads like this would only make new people afraid to post as they wont want to risk being on the thread and if they end up on the thread they definitely won’t want to post again. If you joined a community and asked a question about something and got totally abused and laughed at for it - would you want to post again?

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Most stupid moments thread
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:18, topic:519787”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=638282.msg4302206#msg4302206 date=1369176619]

the question though is Flame_ when was the rule made?

Are you referring to the rule “Rule 2: Everybody is equal, don’t treat people worse than you do others(E.G., don’t isolate someone and flame them)?”
If so, that rule has been around since the creation of this site and Moparisthebest. Please correct me if I’m wrong.
[/quote]then why pray tell was the rule not enforced?[/quote]
Was the thread not locked? I’m also pretty sure that you, as a normal user, are unable to view a profile’s infraction history, so who’s to say that users within that thread were not infracted or banned?

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Most stupid moments thread
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:519787”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=638282.msg4302179#msg4302179 date=1369175109]
Make a thread then, and see how the moderators react. I can guarantee it will be locked as soon as one negative reply is given.
Rule two of the global rules states my point specifically:[quote]Rule 2:
Everybody is equal, don’t treat people worse than you do others(E.G., don’t isolate someone and flame them).[/quote]
I shouldn’t have to go any farther. Referring to my previous statement, everybody - regardless of the environment - has feelings. Respect that.
[/quote]then how do you explain the actions of that ex-staff member from the mopar quotes section who was quoted eh?[/quote]
Can I get a direct example, please?

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Most stupid moments thread
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Make a thread then, and see how the moderators react. I can guarantee it will be locked as soon as one negative reply is given.
Rule two of the global rules states my point specifically:

Rule 2:
Everybody is equal, don’t treat people worse than you do others(E.G., don’t isolate someone and flame them).

I shouldn’t have to go any farther. Referring to my previous statement, everybody - regardless of the environment - has feelings. Respect that.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Most stupid moments thread
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:8, topic:519787”]Pardon me, but that is a very bad idea in my opinion.
There is absolutely no point in having a board to diminish the reputation of others.
What do you get out of it? A five minute giggle.
What does the user who is talked about get out of that sort of thread?
[ul][li]Users will find it incredibly hard to rebuild a positive reputation.[/li]
[li]Unfair and unjust assumptions will be made towards the user.[/li]
[li]Regardless of whether or not we are on the internet, people have feelings. Respect that, please.[/li][/ul]

If you want to post about stupid moments, the Funny Mopar Quotes or Official Funny Pictures and Videos Thread suits that purpose just fine. There is no reason to add a new board just because.[/quote]^ thread not board

and the mopar quotes are for quotes not an actual discussion.

As far as “giving somebody a bad reputation” Your reputation is earned not just freely given out. If you actually strive to be a good programmer, a good part of the community we would have nothing to humiliate you about.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Most stupid moments thread
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Pardon me, but that is a very bad idea in my opinion.
There is absolutely no point in having a board to diminish the reputation of others.
What do you get out of it? A five minute giggle.
What does the user who is talked about get out of that sort of thread?
[ul][li]Users will find it incredibly hard to rebuild a positive reputation.[/li]
[li]Unfair and unjust assumptions will be made towards the user.[/li]
[li]Regardless of whether or not we are on the internet, people have feelings. Respect that, please.[/li][/ul]

If you want to post about stupid moments, the Funny Mopar Quotes or Official Funny Pictures and Videos Thread suits that purpose just fine. There is no reason to add a new board just because.

Read full topic
